'''''Tolkien Studies'': Volume 19 Supplement''' is the supplement issue to [[Tolkien Studies: Volume 19|''Tolkien Studies 19'']], published in [[2022]].

This volume publishes the important paper "[[The Chronology of The Lord of the Rings]]", edited with notes and commentary by [[William Cloud Hicklin]]. The paper presents [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s unpublished manuscripts of the time-scheme, or "Chronology", on which his ''The Lord of the Rings'' is based.

==Contents==
* Editors' Introduction
* Editors' Acknowledgments
* Conventions and Abbreviations
* [[William Fliss]], "Preface"
* J.R.R. Tolkien, William Cloud Hicklin, "The Chronology of The Lord of the Rings'"
* Note on Contributor
